Class CreateMatchAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.server.ServerController.ClientControllerAction
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.server.ServerController.CreateMatchAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CreateMatchAction extends ClientControllerAction
Action that allows a client to create a new game match with the specified flight level and player count. On success, broadcasts the updated list of available matches to all clients and sends a NotifySuccessAction to the creator. On failure, sends a NotifyExceptionAction with the error message.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • CreateMatchAction

      public CreateMatchAction(String username, FlightBoard.Type flightLevel, int numPlayers)
      Constructs a new CreateMatchAction.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the client creating the match
      flightLevel - the flight board type for the match
      numPlayers - the desired number of players

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(ServerController serverController) throws NetworkException
      Executes the match creation in the ServerController.
      • Calls serverController.createMatch with the provided parameters.
      • Retrieves the updated available matches map.
      • Broadcasts a SendAvailableMatchesAction to all connected clients.
      • Sends a NotifySuccessAction to the creator.
      • On exception, sends a NotifyExceptionAction containing the error message to the requester.
      Specified by:
      execute in class ClientControllerAction
      Parameters:
      serverController - the ServerController handling the request
      Throws:
      NetworkException - if a network error occurs during execution
